argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mrcfval.f | |- F = ( mrCls ` C ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mrcf | |- ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) -> F : ~P X --> C ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> F : ~P X --> C ) |
| 4 |  | #P_mre1cl | |- ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) -> X e. C ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elpw2g | |- ( X e. C -> ( U e. ~P X <-> U C_ X ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) -> ( U e. ~P X <-> U C_ X ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_biimpar | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> U e. ~P X ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> ( F ` U ) e. C ) |
